name: Tarian
description:
Tarian is a 2D action platformer where you play as a goblin looking to prove his strength by reaching the top of the tower. 

The game has a focus on using the shield for defense. You can also control the position of the weapons with the mouse.

Note:

You'll need a mouse to play the game

Dev Log:

https://maxmakesgames.wixsite.com/maxmakesgames/shield-game

Install Instructions

Un-zip the folder and open the .exe file
